A BWB Text Sample

This sample BWB Text contains the first three chapters from Rebecca Macfie's Report from Christchurch, published in association with the New Zealand Listener.

Please visit our website to purchase access to the rest of the work and to find out more about BWB Texts, including the following works:
 

Paul Callaghan: Luminous Moments by Paul Callaghan

Creeks and Kitchens: A Childhood Memoir by Maurice Gee

'I think … I am going to die.': Katherine Mansfield at Fontainebleau by Kathleen Jones

Hidden Agendas: What We Need to Know about the TPPA by Jane Kelsey

Geering and God, 1965-71: The Heresy Trial that Divided New Zealand by Lloyd Geering

Inequality and the West by Robert Wade

The Zealandia Drowning Debate: Did New Zealand Sink Beneath the Waves? by Hamish Campbell
